scripts.start: yarn migrate:latest && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "NODE_ENV=development OARE_JWT_TOKEN=secret yarn server" "yarn client"
scripts.zip: cd packages/backend && zip -q -r oare_build.zip build dist package.json yarn.lock .ebextensions @oare && cp oare_build.zip ../..
scripts.test: yarn workspace @oare/frontend test && yarn workspace @oare/backend test && yarn workspace @oare/oare test utils.test.ts
